commit message: - Fix custom search domain ignored (closes issue #36)
clarify warning, reset domain on opening tun
bring openvpn in sync with openvpn git master and patches submitted to mailing list
Implement reconnect on network change (closes issue #37)
Always use tcp-client instead of tcp to allow static keys with tcp

Correct network state message
Improve logging framework a bit
Add logging of certificates received from Keystore
Allow being by external app with profile name

- Fix last commit
- Implement reading extra CA cert from file to fix keystore error on some mobile phones
